snippet.title: Earthsiege 2 Trailer
snippet.description: Oh man...this was an absolute delight of a game back in the day (and still is to be honest).  It was one of the first 3D games I played on my PC, and I especially bought a joystick for...the missions, the graphics, the pyrotechnics, the addiction...thsi realyl had me glued on the screen.  And it was also the 1st game that introduced me to flight control and combat.  It still rocks even after all these years, and outruns most modern robotic shoot em ups in terms of gameplay and storyline (if not graphics).  Another Sierra Classic of mine!!!!
